---
category: news
title: "New flexible, steerable device placed in live brains by minimally invasive robot"
excerpt: "Scientists have successfully placed a bioinspired steerable catheter into the brain of an animal. The early-stage research tested the delivery and safety of the new implantable catheter design in two sheep to determine its potential for use in diagnosing and treating diseases in the brain."
